```{r include = FALSE}
#Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
library(readxl)
library(downloader)
library(foreign)
library(textreadr)
```

```{r include = FALSE}
#Load Data

#xlsx Data
xlsx_data <- tempfile()
download("https://github.com/WJC-Data-Science/DTS350/blob/master/Height.xlsx?raw=true", xlsx_data, mode = "wb")
height_xlsx <- read_xlsx(xlsx_data)

#Dta Data
dta1_data <- tempfile()
download("https://github.com/WJC-Data-Science/DTS350/blob/master/germanconscr.dta?raw=true", dta1_data , mode = "wb")
german_conscr_dta <- read_dta(dta1_data)

dta2_data <- tempfile()
download("https://github.com/WJC-Data-Science/DTS350/blob/master/germanprison.dta?raw=true", dta2_data , mode = "wb")
german_prison_dta <- read_dta(dta2_data)

#DBF Data
dbf_data <- tempfile()
download("https://github.com/WJC-Data-Science/DTS350/blob/master/Heights_south-east/B6090.DBF?raw=true", dbf_data , mode = "wb")
heights_south_east_dbf <- read.dbf(dbf_data, as.is = FALSE)


#RTF Data
rtf_data <- tempfile()
download("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/WJC-Data-Science/DTS350/master/Heights_south-east/b6090.rtf", rtf_data , mode = "wb")
heights_south_east_rtf <- read_rtf(rtf_data)
head(heights_south_east_rtf)

#Csv Data
csv_data <- tempfile()
download("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hadley/r4ds/master/data/heights.csv", csv_data , mode = "wb")
wage_height_csv <- read_csv(csv_data)

```
